moduleMeta.name: dailyOutput
moduleMeta.author: longyinping11@lzb.ac.cn
moduleMeta.description: writing model outputs in acsii grid format, including precipitation, actual evapotranspiration, runoff, snowmelt, soil moisture, depth to groundwater, groundwater storage, canopy intercepted water, snow pack water storage, soil surface water storage and soil water depth in the whole profile

var.name: currentDate
var.description: the simulation date

var.name: baseArray
var.description: a 2D array that dipicts the study area extent

var.name: precOutPath
var.description: precipitation output path

var.name: eactOutPath
var.description: actual evapotranspiration output path

var.name: runoffOutPath
var.description: runoff output path

var.name: snowmeltOutPath
var.description: snowmelt output path

var.name: MoistureOutPath
var.description: soil moisture output path

var.name: dglOutPath
var.description: depth to groundwater output path

var.name: GWstOutPath
var.description: groundwater storage output path

var.name: CstOutPath
var.description: canopy intercepted water output path

var.name: snowOutPath
var.description: snow pack water storage output path

var.name: sstOutPath
var.description: soil surface water storage output path

var.name: soilWaterDepthOutPath
var.description: soil water depth of the profile output path

var.name: prec
var.description: daily precipitation at each grid of the study area

var.name: Eact
var.description: actual evapotranspiration at each grid of the study area

var.name: qin
var.description: runoff at each grid of the study area

var.name: snowmelt
var.description: snowmelt at each grid of the study area

var.name: w
var.description: moisture of each soil layer at each grid of the study area

var.name: dgl
var.description: depth from soil surface to ground water at each grid of the study area

var.name: GWst
var.description: ground water storage at each grid of the study area

var.name: Cst
var.description: canopy intercepted water at each grid of the study area

var.name: snowdepth
var.description: snow pack water storage at each grid of the study area

var.name: sst
var.description: soil surface water storage at each grid of the study area
soil water depth of the profile at each grid of the study area

var.name: nrows
var.description: the nrows value in the ascii file

var.name: ncols
var.description: the ncols value in the ascii file

var.name: xllcorner
var.description: the xllcorner value in the ascii file

var.name: yllcorner
var.description: the yllcorner value in the ascii file

var.name: cellsize
var.description: the cellsize value in the ascii file

var.name: nodata
var.description: the nodata value in the ascii file
